attributes.action: Block British business from trading in Burma
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Burma imprisons and murders pro-democracy activists,sometimes their children too.Many Burmese people are struggling in poverty,beneath the iron heel of a military dictatorship.
A comparison of countries whose businesses are trading in Burma,reveals that Britain is amongst the worst offenders.This is a national disgrace.
Those calling for democracy in Burma,have called for British business to pull out of the country.They beleive that this commerce,props up the brutal Burmese regime.
These suffering campaigners, have made it clear that Britain,has offered nothing but excuses when it comes to showing real support for Burmese democrats.
